original_text: Somebody told Bartimaeus that Jesus from Nazareth was walking past him. So he began to shout. He said, ‘Jesus, Son of David! Please be kind to me and help me!’
korean_text: 나사렛 예수시란 말을 듣고 소리 질러 이르되 다윗의 자손 예수여 나를 불쌍히 여기소서 하거늘

sentences.original_text: that Jesus from Nazareth was walking past him
sentences.korean_translation: 나사렛 예수님께서 그를 지나가고 계신다는 것을

sentences.original_text: Please be kind to me and help me!
